website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful wood grain storage bench with open storage areas underneath the seat.
pros: Entryway bench ships with tufted cushions for the top that look perfect
Offers storage beneath the bench with three open areas that you can slide bins into or use as is
Available in three different wood stain colors, along with black
Reasonable price point for this type of quality
cons: Open storage areas can become jumbled

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put everyday shoes in and umbrellas. Once my son put it together I was impressed. It did take him about 1.5!hours and he needed to use a glove when using the allen wrench. Overall perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Janet C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive, love it!
customer_reviews.text: It took two people to put it together (thank God for friends!), but it wasnt super difficult. It's very sturdy and solid...and to be honest, we're big people and it supports heavy weights with no problem. Most importantly, it looks GREAT and all the storage is neatly tucked away and not visible. It's perfect for what we were looking for for the back door where our two dogs go in and out--room for leashes, towels to wipe their feet, shoes for us, etc. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kritzman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking bench but not sturdy. I put it together myself which wasn't too bad, but the minute I moved it to the spot I wanted, the bottom piece broke. I guess I shouldn't have scooted it. I did contact seller and they are shipping me a replacement part for the broken piece. It still doesn't seem sturdy. I examined it the other day and another part looks wobbly as if it needs to be tightened. Would not let anyone sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged and no response from the manufacture
customer_reviews.text: Arrived last week and the box was intact with no damage, but once I unpacked everything, The main piece that is connected to everything had a crack down the screw line. I tried calling the manufacture with no luck. I've completed their form and submitted them to get a new piece sent but still haven't heard from them. I'll give it a couple more days and will then have to box everything back up and send it back. It's a shame because it looks like it will be nice once it's put together.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to put together but damages easily
customer_reviews.text: We initially really liked this storage bench. Fairly easy to put together and it really looked nice in our guest bedroom. However the bottom side piece came apart when I accidentally ran the vacuum into it. Keep in mind I wasn't running at full speed just normal vacuuming. It seems to me the bench should be able to take a little wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and great storage, but watch out for the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and strength of this bench. I have a very long entrance hallway, and it looks great without obstructing the walkway. The cushion is thick and comfortable. The baskets are handy for storing the grandkids shoes and toys. It is durable, as my husband weighs 240 lbs and it holds him. What I didn't like were the instructions. There's a certain way the divider pieces had to fit in order foe the back piece to fit. The directions weren't clear and the pieces weren't clearly marked as to front and back. Once the piece has been screwed, and then unscrewed, it wasn't as strong. But, overall, really pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMy JEEP

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy piece of furniture, even if pressboard.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy piece of furniture, even though it's laminated pressboard. They supply dowels and glue for all the structural joints, combined with the cam-locks to draw everything together. It took me a couple of hours to assemble, but it wasn't complicated. I'd give it 5 stars but I subtracted one because the laminate is thin and slightly peeled from one corner. Overall a nice addition to my step-daughter's first house.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Savino

customer_reviews.title: Cute enough but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It baffles me how anyone can call this little bench beautiful? Cute enough and does the job but certainly cheaply made particle board with dowel holes that are much too big. Be sure to use the glue and let it dry before final assembly. We paid $108.91 on May 4th and today on May 7th it sells for $146.90. This wasn’t worth a dollar more than what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Z.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice ones put together it was very difficult to put together by myself I wish the bench pillow was thicker but it's very cheaply made along with the Box drawers. Im going to replace them. Too pricey for how it is made. Id look elsewhere first then come back to this if you cant find another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage bench
customer_reviews.text: Bench was easy to put together and looks nice. I am giving it 4 stars due to the cushion seam opening up in one area but it is a pretty easy fix. Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer 1000

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Happy at a wonderful price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mud room. It went together fairly easy and looks wonderful. My kids loving having a place for their shoes and a nice place to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, everything you need to put it together is a screw driver and that is it. Looks great, puts together easy, just follow the instructions, give yourself a couple of hours to do it right. Very sturdy piece. Came well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it would be a great addition to the front entry way. When I started putting the it together it went fairly well. Half way through the holes did not line up which made finishing the bench very difficult. It is flimsy and starting to break and we haven’t even used it! I liked the color but that is it. At this point all I could do is toss it in the trash and be upset for he money I just wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3masterofnone

customer_reviews.title: I love this bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench, exactly what I wanted. The seat cushion is maybe not as plush as I hoped but not giving it less stars for that
customer_reviews.author: UND Fighting Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant at First to buy this
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy this because I thought it would be too small for the space I was going to use it in. I didn't want to get it and then have to return it. I am happy to report that it fits perfectly in the spot I needed it, I have family members that are over 6 feet tall and over 200lbs and the can sit on it with no issues at all. It is very sturdy and looks great with the rest of the Walker Edison pieces I have.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money! Instructions werent perfect, but ny husband figured it out. Pretty sturdy for my kids jumping on and off it and my husband uses it daily to take his boots off, from work Holds two adults (200& 150lbs) both no problem . Makes it easy to have kids throw shoes in the bins and be done
customer_reviews.author: luba

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with quality and looks
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it holds 400+ pounds was a bonus for me... 2 people can sit on it without fear of it not holding up. It is sturdy and well built. Took about an hour to assemble. Definitely using a drill with the proper bit on it saved time. Love the storage aspect of this unit as well.
customer_reviews.author: HWard

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: The product is beautiful, looks just like the pictures. You need patience when building because all the dowels need to be glued in place and it comes in more peices than you would think. The pad is comfortable enough for our purpose ( under picture window in living room.) I would recommend for being used as an accent piece.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Some of the veneer pieces are chipped on the edges. The dowel and cam lock assembly is easy but not very durable. The assembled table looks ok but I doubt it will hold up very long under normal wear and tear. My cats like to lounge on it so 1 extra star for feline approval.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkiecat

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Service!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bench however one of the straps broke on one of the bins. When contacted the website it took 2 weeks for a reply to which they said I was past the 90 warranty and would need to charge me for parts. It was literally days from when I sent the request after the item was arrived. Terrible service. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within three days.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed with this item. I just got it Wednesday, today is Saturday. It took hours to put together but when I finally finished I was really pleased with it. Today I moved it aside to do some work in my living room and the leg broke right off. The wood split. Now I'm not sure if it'll be ok to hold my children without completely losing the leg and breaking. Also as I went to move the bins out to try to fix it, the handle on a bin ripped right off.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Navrocki

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable spot to takeoff your shoes after entering the house!! So easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to put by front door so my kids can store their shoes. Three kids and three bens! Worked out perfectly. I added the pillows from around the house/ they are NOT included with bench purchase but add a nice final touch!
customer_reviews.author: ~TK~

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: No stars from me. Love this bench. But not sturdy. Tried to get replacements or parts for pieces that broke on first day I had it. And my only option is to contact the manufacturer or send this bench back and they will replace it. Can you imagine the hassle when I already put the box out. In the rain. And the cost to return an item of this weight? Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Powell

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: The pictures make this look much nicer than it actually is. The quality is crap. Nothing really fits right and lines up.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great in Living Room
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the grey wash. I hired someone to assemble it and it took less than half an hour to do. There were a couple minor scratches on it, so that’s why I can’t give this a 5 star review. It holds my shoes and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench, only issue is it tried to come apart a few times. Im not a fan of having to glue things I feel this would be best to be assembled completely with screws. Luckily my husband knows how to make things work and got it all to stay together.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Evans

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This item is absolutely gorgeous. I get a ton of compliments on it, all the time! Don't try to put it together on your own. I would recommend 2 people. This is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We love this. It’s a nice-looking piece of furniture and keeps our shoes organized and off the entry-way floor. Sturdy and easy to assemble. A good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: NurseLanae

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Rgt bottom broke when I tried to slide it into place, I wouldn't sit on it, Have it balanced against the wall. Love the look & size, just wish it was more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: c_champlin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fake wood
customer_reviews.text: This bench does seem a lot smaller in person and was a nightmare to put together! The materials are pretty cheap and the directions were hard to follow. My bench also came damaged with a small piece of the faux wood chipped. Luckily, it is in the back so it is not seen at all. With all that being said, I like the look of it and it works for my room.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: got it for my mom fir Christmas she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but the material (partical board) is kind of cheap. Also the cushion only sits on the top and isn't secured. I'm 210Ibs and I wouldn't want anyone heavier than me to sit on it. Use wood glue if you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Great piece !
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this piece ! Perfect add on to my farmhouse theme in the living room. Great color, lots of storage space and perfect size !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pictures say it all
customer_reviews.text: Damage all over product and not because of shipping, poor quality, black/gray stain on cushion and bag was already torn in middle when I opened the package. Just got less than 30 minutes ago and was excited to put it together, now I want to send it back due to price and horrible quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench was hesitant buying reading the reviews about it being delivered damaged. Came perfectly packaged and easy to assemble beautiful bench I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: im a skilled trade guy and have assembled 1000s of thinhs literally - do not buy this product it looks good in the pictures but it is very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Things dont line up and it cracked while assembling, im a skilled trade guy and have assembled 1000s of thinhs literally - do not buy this product it looks good in the pictures but it is very cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Burseth

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but it is very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it is very cheaply made. I have had it for just a couple of months and I went to move it to a different spot in my living room and the bottom edging part broke! The wood just broke in half!
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: Great bench! Looks great in my sunroom
customer_reviews.text: Great bench! Looks great in my sunroom. I use the bins for beach towels. Took a little while to put together especially with the little allen wrench vs using a regular screw driver. But overall, a very nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!!!!!!!!!! Exceptional look, built, durability, price and endless compliments by all who see it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture....!!!!! Would definitely suggest to someone else...!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cherkev

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble sturdy. Good quality. Large baskets for storage
customer_reviews.author: stephanie gillam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and so pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench and cushioned seating. My husband was able to easily follow the instructions to assemble this bench in 2 hours. The wood is good quality-- sturdy-- we bought 2-- one for the bedroom (matches my existing furniture) and one for the front entry.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I really like this and very happy I purchased it! I don't usually give anything 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Shark

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our den.
customer_reviews.text: Bench looks great, cushion was rather thin is the only drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Marc & Whitney Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are made pretty well. Only thing is one of them creaks quite a bit when sitting on it. The pups love it to look out the window though!!
customer_reviews.author: Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is gorgeous! I absolutely love it and looks stunning in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Naisielady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a long time to find the perfect bench for our entry way! Saw this and needed it! My husband had no issues putting it together and it looks amazing! Very very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom legs board split when shifting bench with nothing in it. I expected a little better quality then what it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Zarbock

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth buying. It is cheap and instructions are very unclear. Doesn't look nearly as nice as advertised.. Returning now!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together! Very sturdy I can see alot of life lasting in this one
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Bickell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for, somewhere for people sit in a small space but still able to store things! It took me a little longer than expected because I had to line things up just right or they wouldn’t go together. All in all I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, looks great my entry way, the cubes are very large and hold a ton of the kids shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. I was able to build it myself without ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I was able to build it myself without any issues. It's sturdy and is currently holding roughly 16 different pairs of women's shoes and boots (with room to spare). Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: This bench is awesome and was a great price
customer_reviews.text: This bench is awesome and was a great price. I love that it included the cushion and storage bins. We use the bins for toys and the bench is by the front window so the kids can sit on it and watch for dad to come home. I would recommend this piece. I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Frase

customer_reviews.title: Buy a brand new product. It's worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: One side of the piece was destroyed when it arrived and could not be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Athena A.

customer_reviews.title: Big ol' bench.
customer_reviews.text: This bench is beauitful, and feels like a heavy duty piece of furniture. The only reason I'm giving four out of five stars is because it took my boyfriend and I over three hours to assemble, which was kind of a headache. It was worth it though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Was easy to put together and looks great in our room!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke B

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this purchase. Takes a long time to put together and it is already loose and falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria DeRedin

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: It was not to difficult to assemble. I love the color. The price was great considering that it came with three bins and the cushion!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Casillas

customer_reviews.title: The top feels like it’ll fall apart when you move it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t feel secure. The top feels like it’ll fall apart when you move it. Otherwise very pretty and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Luis Higuera

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in our entryway, great quality for the low price and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: SaraBecca

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. The hardware doesn’t work with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The holes are not measured correctly
customer_reviews.text: Most of the holes are not lined up correctly. Very hard to assemble because holes do not line up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Could find holes for the last assembly task to secure the back on. Other than that, good diagrams and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Judean Marie Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Just wish it was a little more sturdy. So far it's doing it's job. Don't over tighten your screws . Product will crack.
customer_reviews.author: monica l phillips

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bench
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous product for the price! Would definitely buy again. Came extremely well packaged; no damage to any of the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a snap
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and looks great. I love the pull out bins.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Couture

customer_reviews.title: My experience
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the money cheaply made. Looks nice looking at it but the product isn’t very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product for what we paid for
customer_reviews.text: Particle board. Not a bad product for what we paid for, but definitely looks nice enough. Just don't move it much
customer_reviews.author: MistaFancyPants

customer_reviews.title: Horrible directions
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bench but the directions are crappy. The diagram is wrong and hard to follow. The bench isn’t as sturdy as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Wrong drill marks from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: One of the panels was drilled wrong so you cant put it together correctly. Pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love it looks great in my entry way and who doesn’t love extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bench. Exactly what we expected. The instructions have a couple errors but just use your common sense and it's a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P.

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: I like it, took awhile to put together. But it’s perfect for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Lv

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even get a chance to put the bench together. The top seat of the bench was cracked in half when I opened the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and looks nice at the entry door
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my son and his wife. It was easy to assemble and looks nice at the entry door. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product cane damaged. The main top part of the bench was dented and had the top layer pealed back.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: takes a little time to put together but it's beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Study bench, takes a little time to put together but it's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: The laminate coating peels off so easily there were parts missing by the time we finished ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really not worth buying! Go IKEA instead! The color/ wood style is very ugly. The laminate coating peels off so easily there were parts missing by the time we finished assembly. It’s extremely rickety and we followed all instructions carefullly ans tightened every screw properly. When you buy ikea, the screw holes are all extremely uniform. With this, some are so tight you can hardly get them in. Others are loose. I really do not recommend this bench.
customer_reviews.author: CalmShopper

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Design looks nice but it's Made out of cheap compressed wood
customer_reviews.author: emilio

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but built terribly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but built terribly. Was torn about purchasing due to mixed reviews and honestly very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: niikkii

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk -- stay away!
customer_reviews.text: The bench is just what I wanted but the assembly directions were terrible! Parts were mis-labeled and referred to as different numbers in the directions. Steps were missing. The directions were pictures with very little written words. Makes it real hard to understand when parts were labelled wrong and referred to as different numbers in different steps. There should have been a warning to insert the dowel rods 3/4 of the way in and not 1/2 way in. I got the box together but is someone sneezed on it, it would fall apart as some of the boards broke because of the dowel rod issue. THIS IS AN EXPENSIVE PIECE OF JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Walker Edison Furniture Company Modern Farmhouse Entryway Shoe Storage Bench Totes Upholstered Cushion Hallway Organizer, 42 Inch, Barnwood
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 18" H x 42” L x 16” W
Includes three storage bins for your toys, shoes, and more
Made from high-grade certified MDF for long-lasting construction
Includes thick, cotton cushions for a comfortable seat
